metadata.title: Cantonese Daycares & Preschools in San Francisco
metadata.description: Comprehensive directory of daycares and preschools in San Francisco that offer Cantonese language instruction or immersion

daycares.name: Brilliant Kids School
daycares.curriculum: Language-rich environment emphasizing cognitive and emotional growth
daycares.description: Offers a dedicated Cantonese immersion program. Built on research showing that language exposure during early childhood strengthens cognitive development.

daycares.name: True Sunshine Preschool Center
daycares.curriculum: Project-based approach with circle time in both Cantonese and English. Children investigate topics collaboratively, developing vocabulary, literacy, math, and social-emotional skills.
daycares.description: Award-winning non-profit preschool serving San Francisco's Chinatown community for 40+ years. Full-time year-round bilingual English/Cantonese preschool. Moved to current Chinatown location in 1982. Celebrates Chinese Lunar New Year and other cultural holidays.

daycares.name: Wu Yee Children's Services - Lok Yuen Center
daycares.tuition: Head Start (free for eligible families) and tuition-based slots available
daycares.curriculum: Creative Curriculum with play-based design. Designated Dual Language Learning demonstration site by First 5 San Francisco.
daycares.description: Lok Yuen means 'Happy Garden' in Cantonese. Designated by First 5 San Francisco as a Dual Language Learning demonstration site where children learn and play in both English and Cantonese. Part of Wu Yee Children's Services, SF's largest Head Start provider.

daycares.name: Wu Yee Children's Services - Little Sprouts (Chinatown Infant Center)
daycares.tuition: Head Start (free for eligible families) and tuition-based slots available
daycares.curriculum: Creative Curriculum, play-based. Wu Yee's only dedicated Early Head Start infant learning center.
daycares.description: Wu Yee's only dedicated Early Head Start early learning center, located in Chinatown. Over 50% of Wu Yee's staff are proficient in Cantonese and other Chinese dialects. 'Wu Yee' is a Cantonese phrase meaning 'protector of children.'

daycares.name: Chinatown Community Children's Center - Clay Street
daycares.curriculum: Early Childhood Development Program fostering kindergarten readiness
daycares.description: Founded in 1972, one of the oldest non-profit early education centers in SF. Served 3,000+ families. Dedicated to new immigrant and bilingual/bicultural families. Provides health screenings and early identification of special needs.

daycares.name: Chinatown Community Children's Center - North Beach
daycares.curriculum: Early Childhood Development Program fostering kindergarten readiness
daycares.description: Second location of CCCC. Same mission serving new immigrant and bilingual/bicultural families in San Francisco.

daycares.name: Happy Day Preschool
daycares.curriculum: Cantonese and English literacy skills, math, science, art, social studies, and music
daycares.description: Daycare center providing Cantonese language immersion and education. Walk-ins welcomed. Curriculum focuses on Cantonese and English literacy skills alongside STEM and arts.

daycares.name: Little Star Preschool Too
daycares.language_program_type: Trilingual - Optional Cantonese or Mandarin second language program
daycares.curriculum: Play-based licensed program. Develops social, cognitive, motor, emotional, and language skills for kindergarten readiness.
daycares.meals_provided: Morning and afternoon snacks plus hot lunch
daycares.description: Trilingual preschool (English, Cantonese, Mandarin) in the Sunset district since 1995. Annual assessments, parent-teacher conferences, enrichment activities on and off campus. Licensed by Dept of Social Services, member of PACE.

daycares.name: Just Kids Preschool
daycares.language_program_type: Chinese Immersion (50% Cantonese / 50% Mandarin reported, primarily listed as Mandarin)
daycares.curriculum: Language immersion, Montessori, Reggio Emilia, Waldorf blended approach
daycares.description: 100% Chinese immersion program. Multiple curriculum approaches blended. License verified Feb 2026. Accepts Early Learning Scholarship Vouchers.

daycares.name: Starry Family Childcare
daycares.curriculum: Play-based: music, dramatic play, art/crafts, stories, science, senses, sports, field trips

staff.name: Suzanne
staff.qualifications: CPR/First Aid certified, 17 units child development

staff.name: May
staff.qualifications: CPR/First Aid certified, childcare center experience

daycares.description: Licensed family home daycare in North Beach/Chinatown area. Trilingual environment (Cantonese, Mandarin, English). Focus on physical, cognitive, language, social, and emotional development through unstructured, self-selected play.

daycares.name: Rising Star Family Childcare
daycares.hours: Flexible - daycare and nightcare available 365 days/year
daycares.curriculum: Play-based: music, dramatic play, art/crafts, stories, science, senses, sports, field trips
daycares.description: Licensed bilingual family childcare that speaks Chinese (Cantonese & Mandarin) and English. Unique offering of flexible hours including nightcare and 365-day availability. Focus on expanding children's language ability and cultural diversity.

daycares.name: Modern Education Family Childcare

address_locations.name: Mission Bay
address_locations.address: Channel St & 4th St, San Francisco, CA 94158

address_locations.name: Outer Sunset
address_locations.address: 48th Ave & Moraga St, San Francisco, CA 94122

address_locations.name: Portola
address_locations.address: Sweeny St & Dunsmuir St, San Francisco, CA 94134

address_locations.name: SoMa
address_locations.address: Folsom St & 4th St, San Francisco, CA 94107

address_locations.name: Hayes Valley
address_locations.address: Hickory St & Laguna St, San Francisco, CA 94102

address_locations.name: South San Francisco
address_locations.address: Alta Mesa Dr & El Campo Dr, SSF, CA 94080

daycares.curriculum: Developmentally appropriate activities and play-based learning
daycares.subsidies_accepted: CalWORKs, CAAP, Early Learning for All (ELFA), state childcare subsidies and vouchers
daycares.description: Network of 6 licensed family daycare homes across SF Bay Area. Staff fluent in English, Mandarin & Cantonese. State licensed, background checked, CPR and First Aid certified. Portola location offers Cantonese immersion specifically. Accepts all major state subsidies.

daycares.name: Little Crystal Learning Child Care
daycares.address: 690 Long Bridge Street, #118, San Francisco, CA 94158
daycares.description: Licensed family home daycare in Mission Bay. Chinese (Mandarin or Cantonese) bilingual care. Operated by Jialing Zhang.

daycares.name: Learn n' Play
daycares.hours: Mon-Fri 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM; Weekends by prior scheduling
daycares.curriculum: Play-based: playground visits, library time, sing-alongs, healthy meals

staff.name: Lisa (Yim Fan)
staff.qualifications: 17+ years experience, licensed childcare provider, CPR certified

daycares.description: Home-based bilingual childcare with 17 years of community service. Offers flexible care options including overnight and weekend care. Staff fluent in Cantonese, Mandarin, and English.

daycares.name: Little Sunshine Childcare
daycares.curriculum: Focus on physical, emotional, social and mental growth. Music development (piano), art and crafts, reading, indoor/outdoor activities

staff.name: Ada
staff.qualifications: Associate Teacher Permit (CCSF), 17 years experience, studying Child Nutrition at CCSF, fluent in Cantonese and Mandarin, piano skills

daycares.description: Family home daycare operated by Ada, a professional pre-school educator with 17 years of experience across China and US. Fluent in Cantonese and Mandarin. Specializes in music development and nutrition-focused care.

daycares.name: Little Sunshine Family Daycare
daycares.description: Licensed family daycare home in the Sunset district. Staff speak Cantonese and Mandarin. Licensed since December 2019.

daycares.name: Hong's Family Daycare
daycares.description: Licensed family daycare and preschool with 30 years of experience. Children learn and play in English, Mandarin, and Cantonese. Highly rated with 41 Yelp reviews.

daycares.name: Little Dolphin Family Day Care
daycares.description: Family daycare in the Sunset district with verified license. Highly rated (5.0 on Yelp with 24 reviews). Listed among top Cantonese preschools in SF.

daycares.name: Panda Garden Children's Center
daycares.language_program_type: Mandarin immersion (some Cantonese reported by parents)
daycares.curriculum: Reggio Emilia inspired, emergent/interactive/content-rich curriculum. 1:4 teacher-student ratio.
daycares.description: Mandarin-immersion childcare center in the Sunset district since 2011. Reggio Emilia approach with small groups. Parents report children also learn Cantonese. Licensed, follows CDD guidance.

daycares.name: Kai Ming Head Start

address_locations.name: PMsquare
address_locations.address: 671 China Basin St, San Francisco, CA 94158

daycares.language_program_type: Dual-language curriculum; North Beach is designated DLL demonstration site
daycares.curriculum: Dual-language, culturally relevant, family-centric approach. Teacher-child ratio 1:3 (infants), 1:4 (toddlers), 1:5 to 1:8 (preschool).
daycares.subsidies_accepted: Head Start / Early Head Start (free for eligible families)
daycares.description: Founded 1975. SF's major Head Start provider with 9 centers citywide. Offers free or low-cost preschool and infant/toddler care for eligible families. Multicultural, dual-language programs. North Beach center is a Dual Language Learning demonstration site. Also offers prenatal and home-based services, health screenings, parent education, and IEP services via SFUSD partnership.

daycares.name: Wu Yee Children's Services - Additional Centers
daycares.description: Wu Yee operates 12 centers across SF. While Lok Yuen (listed separately) is the designated Cantonese DLL site, over 50% of all Wu Yee staff are proficient in Cantonese. Other centers with likely Cantonese-speaking staff include:
daycares.tuition: Head Start (free for eligible) and tuition-based slots

daycares.name: Little Leaf Daycare
daycares.description: Childcare center with specialized Mandarin immersion program. Listed on Winnie as offering Chinese (Mandarin or Cantonese) and English services. Located in West of Twin Peaks area.
